page.title: 05CLUBS
page.content:
AKELEY WIVES - has 21 members who meet monthly. They are a lively group and at some meetings they have rambled, had a make-up demonstration, theatre trip to Northampton and dinner at the Bull & Butcher' where they elect their com- mittee of 7.
MOTHER & TODDLER GROUP - meet in the village hall once a week, it is an introduction for under 3's to the world of sharing and mixing and a chance for their mums (and dads) to get together.
AKELEY GARDENERS' CLUB - 30 members meet monthly in the village hall where they discuss their problems and successes. Speakers, slide shows, quizzes and outings are a feature. A spring bulb show is held and members get discounts at garden centres.
